title: What Does the Green Dot Mean on Snapchat? Quick Answer

steps.title: The green dot shows when someone was recently active on Snapchat.
steps.content: The green dot shows when someone was recently active on Snapchat. This green dot can stay up to 24 hours after someone has been active, so it isn't an entirely accurate indicator of someone's online activity. In some cases, you may see a measure of time next to the green dot (ex: 5 hours, 23 minutes). There are other ways to tell if someone's online on Snapchat, such as checking Snap Scores, Stories , and Snap Map.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This is in the top-left corner of Snapchat. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the cog icon.
steps.content: Tap the cog icon. You can find this in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Activity Indicator.
steps.content: Tap Activity Indicator . This is under the Privacy Controls header; you may need to scroll down to find it.

steps.title: Toggle off "Activity Indicator".
steps.content: Toggle off "Activity Indicator". This setting will be disabled. A green dot will not appear next to your Snapchat avatar when you're active.
